front.title: Combined DES-CBC, HMAC and Replay Prevention Security Transform

abstract.t: This draft describes a combination of privacy, authentication, integrity and replay prevention into a single packet format. This document is the result of significant work by several major contributors and the IPsec working group as a whole. These contributors, cited later in this document, provided many of the key technical details summarized in this document. [IB93] [IBK93]
